item.title: Professional Web Development and Translation
item.content:
<p><img alt="" class="float-left" src="http://localhost/_projects/getsimple/_getsimple_innovation_grid/data/uploads/images/alanamos-photo.jpg" style="width: 150px; height: 198px;" />I am a freelance web-site developer, translator and technical author, and a native English speaker living in Berlin.</p>
<p>Follow the links in the menu to the right to find out more about the services I provide.</p>
item.author: admin
